ext_expr.h

00001 /* ext_expr.h -- header file for writing expressions */
00002 
00003 #ifndef _EXT_EXPR_H_
00004 #define _EXT_EXPR_H_
00005 
00006 #ifdef __cplusplus
00007 extern "C" {
00008 #endif
00009 
00010 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00011     #pragma pack(push, 2)
00012 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00013     #pragma pack(2)
00014 #endif
00015 
00016 #define MAXMAX      /* <z> added to users of this stuff won't be screwed */
00017 
00018 #define MAX_VARS    9
00019 
00020 struct ex_funcs {
00021     char *f_name;       /* function name */
00022     long (*f_func)();   /* the real function performing the function */
00023     long f_argc;        /* number of arguments */
00024 };
00025 #define name_ok(c)  (((c)=='_') || ((c)>='a' && (c)<='z') || \
00026             ((c)>='A' && (c)<='Z') || ((c) >= '0' && (c) <= '9'))
00027 #define unary_op(x) ((x) == OP_NOT || (x) == OP_NEG || (x) == OP_UMINUS)
00028 
00029 typedef struct ex_ex {
00030     union {
00031         long v_int;
00032         float v_flt;
00033         long op;
00034         char **ptr;
00035     } ex_cont;      /* content */
00036 #define ex_int      ex_cont.v_int
00037 #define ex_flt      ex_cont.v_flt
00038 #define ex_op       ex_cont.op
00039 #define ex_ptr      ex_cont.ptr
00040     long ex_type;       /* type of the node */
00041 } Ex_ex;
00042 #define exNULL  ((struct ex_ex *)0)
00043 
00044 /* defines for ex_type */
00045 #define ET_INT      0x1     /* an int */
00046 #define ET_FLT      0x2     /* a float */
00047 #define ET_OP       0x3     /* operator */
00048 #define ET_STR      0x4     /* string */
00049 #define ET_TBL      0x5     /* a table, the content is a pointer */
00050 #define ET_FUNC     0x6     /* a function */
00051 #define ET_SYM      0x7     /* symbol ("string") */
00052 #define ET_VSYM     0x8     /* variable symbol ("$s?") */
00053 
00054 typedef struct expr {
00055     struct object exp_ob;
00056     void *exp_outlet;
00057     struct ex_ex **exp_stack;
00058     struct ex_ex exp_var[MAX_VARS];
00059     struct ex_ex exp_res;       /* the result of last evaluation */
00060 } Expr, t_expr;
00061 
00062 void *expr_new(short argc, t_atom *argv, t_atom *result);
00063 short expr_eval(t_expr *x, short argc, t_atom *argv, t_atom *result);
00064 void expr_install(exprmethod fun, const char *buf, short argc);
00065 
00066 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00067     #pragma pack(pop)
00068 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00069     #pragma pack()
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #ifdef __cplusplus
00073 }
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 #endif /* _EXT_EXPR_H_ */
